Package io.itch.jaknak72.oozed.game.objects

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Button.Action  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AABB
    Bounding box, registers itself to the physics system
    AnimatedSprite
    Animated sprite object that gets drawn on the canvas
    Blocker
    Blocker enemy, that cannot be touched from front can be configured to walk back and forth on platform or stand still
    Button
    Defines an area on screen, when tapped a given action is performed
    Copter
    Enemy with a small helicopter, can hover on start position or fly upwards (also takes rotation into account) the rotor on top is deadly for the player
    DeadlyAABB
    Adds deadly behaviour to bounding box, that kills things by calling GameObject::kill() it kills everything it can collide with
    Enemy
    Enemy base class that updates the enemy counter Creates a disappear effect on kill
    GameObject
    Base class for every type of object in the game
    Jumper  
    KillEnemiesObjective
    Calls Game::clearLevel() and kills itself, when all enemies have been killed
    Lifetime
    kills given gameobject after given amount of frames have passed if null is passed as gameobject, then the object kills itself
    MuteButton
    Button that mutes/unmutes music sprite is changed depending on current mute state
    Platform
    represents a whole platform (all connected tiles are added as children) currently empty but already here for expandability
    Player
    Player object ASSUMPTION: the player never runs faster than its own size in a single frame, otherwise edge turns cannot be performed correctly since every frame two rays are performed down at the front and back of the player to detect the start of running off the edge Dashing can only end while running, so the player won't suddenly become slower in midair
    Rect
    Draws a rectangle
    Sprite
    Static sprite object that gets drawn on the canvas For animated sprites use AnimatedSprite instead
    TestTouchRect
    Test object used for testing basic collision
    Text
    Draws a text
    TouchEventFilter
    As long as this game object exists, touch events are filtered.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Blocker.BlockerState  
    Jumper.JumperState  
    Player.PlayerState
